p: Animals were orally administered BPA (50 mg/kg b.w.) and/or PSO (1 mL/kg b.w.) before either with or after BPA administration for 28 successive days as follows: group 1 (control); group 2 (vehicle); group 3 (PSO); group 4 (BPA); group 5 (PSO before BPA); group 6 (PSO with BPA) and group 7 (PSO after BPA). Clinical signs were examined twice a day, and body weight was measured once a week during the experimental period.
